entry.title: I am applying for a P.h.D position, if you are interested in my reaserch, please contact me !
entry.content:
I am currently pursuing a M.S. in the Institute of Machine Intelligence at University of Shanghai for Science and Technology (USST), supervised by Assoc. Prof. Song Tang.

Information

Email: suwenxin43@gmail.com
Research Interests: Computer Vision; Transfer Learning; Medical Image Analysis
Google Scholar: https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=BPQ9bSwAAAAJ

Publications

  • [ICLR’25 (oral, acceptance rate ≈ 1.8%)] Song Tang and Wenxin Su, Mao Ye, Jianwei Zhang and Xiatian Zhu. Proxy Denoising for Source-Free Domain Adaptation.
  • [ARXIV’24] Wenxin Su, Song Tang, Xiaofeng Liu, Xiaojing Yi, Mao Ye, Chunxiao Zu, Jiahao Li, Xiatian Zhu. Domain Adaptive Diabetic Retinopathy Grading with Model Absence and Flowing Data.
  • [ARXIV’24] Song Tang, Wenxin Su, Mao Ye, Jianwei Zhang and Xiatian Zhu. Unified source-free domain adaptation. and Code
  • [CVPR’24] Song Tang, Wenxin Su, Mao Ye, and Xiatian Zhu. Source-free domain adaptation with frozen multimodal foundation model. and project page
  • [CAAI TRIT’23] Song Tang, Wenxin Su, Yan Yang, Lijuan Chen, and Mao Ye. Model adaptation via credible local context representation. and Code

Research Project

  • Unified Source-Free Domain Adaptation (SFDA) framework (154 stars), 2024.03 - Present
    • Independently designed and implemented the first unified Source-Free Domain Adaptation (SFDA) framework project based on PyTorch. The project includes the 10 most mainstream SFDA methods from 2020 to 2024, such as SHOT, NRC, COWA, AdaContrast, PLUE, and our team’s LCFD, DIFO, TPDS, SCLM, and GKD.
    • https://github.com/tntek/source-free-domain-adaptation

Education and Professional

  • USST, China, 2022.09 - Present

    • Master Student, Biomedical Engineering
    • Advisor: Assoc. Prof. Song Tang
    • GPA: 3.9/4.0 Top 5%

  • Chengdu Aosailixing Information Technology Service Co., Ltd., China, 2021.03 – 2022.04

    • Data Analyst
    • Responsibilities: Build machine learning models to analyze data

  • Halmstad University, Sweden, 2018.09 – 2019.02

    • Exchange Student, Computer Science

  • Chengdu Jincheng College, China, 2017.09 – 2021.06

    • B.S.,(Honor) Internet of Things Engineering
    • GPA: 3.6/4

Research Experience

  • Source-free Domain Adaptation, 2022.04 – Present
  • Diabetic Retinopathy Grading 2024.07 – Present

Academic Service

  • Served as a reviewer for AAAI 2024 and ICLR 2025
  • Presented a talk at the CVPR 2024 poster session.

Selected Honor & Awards

Frist Prize Scholarship of USST

  • Top 5% Mar, 2024

National Scholarship for Postgraduates

  • Top 1% Sep, 2023

Excellent Student of Chengdu Jincheng College

  • Top 1% May, 2021

Second Prize Scholarship at Chengdu Jincheng College

  • Top 20% Sep, 2019

Skills and Hobbies

  • Programming and others: Python, PyTorch, C, R, Data Visualization, Latex, Kettle, MySQL
  • Hobbies: Hiking, Runing, Cycling, Basketball

Picture


CVPR2024

Hiking
